Syntax highlighting of source code snippets in an html page!
### Features ★ Used by code.google.com and stackoverflow.com! ★ 112 languages, ★ 49 styles are available to match your blog style, ★ Compatible with any js framework, ★ works with any markup, ★ Cross Browser Support and more...
### CedHighlightjs Simple and lightweight syntax highlighting of source code snippets using Highlight.js JavaScript library for Joomla.
You don't need to add additional markup to source code and neither to specify the language of source code snippets since prettify will guess. Highlight.js extension for Joomla is compatible with WYSIWYG editors and includes several themes to customize the colors and styles of source code snippets.
Highlight.js JavaScript library supports all C-like (Java, PHP, C#, etc), Bash-like, and XML-like languages without need to specify the language and has customizable styles via CSS. Widely used with good cross-browser support.
### Usage Out of the box, CedHighlightjs for Joomla comes configured to automatically perform syntax highlighting of source code snippets in or tags on your Joomla pages. Automatic syntax highlighting mode is pretty simple, but powerful at the same time. Several settings can be configured at: Administration - Plugin - CedHighlightjs
CedHighlightjs includes several CSS styles publicly available which are used as themes for code Highlight.js
